QuestData.Title: Buy Us Time
QuestData.Description: We need time to evacuate Snowmane Village. Can you take the fight to these Mightstone drogbar and cull their numbers?$b$bI will direct my healers to get everyone that is unable to fight to safety.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need all the time you can buy us.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. Thank you, Champion.$b$bWe have managed to get the children and the wounded to safety thanks to your efforts.
